Uses of Class
pollaxmud.entities.Creature

  • Packages that use Creature 
    Package Description
    pollaxmud.entities
    A package that contains all the game entities, such as creatures and items.
    pollaxmud.world
    A package that contains all classes belonging to the game world.

    • Uses of Creature in pollaxmud.entities

      Subclasses of Creature in pollaxmud.entities 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Sphinx
      A class representing a Sphinx, which inherits from the Creature class.
      class  Teacher
      This class represents a teacher in the game.

    • Uses of Creature in pollaxmud.world

      Methods in pollaxmud.world that return Creature 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Creature Room.getCreatureByName(java.lang.String name)
      Finds a creature in the room with the same name as a given string.
      Creature Room.getSphinx()
      If there is a Sphinx in the room returns it.
      Methods in pollaxmud.world with parameters of type Creature 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Room.addCreature(Creature creatureToAdd)
      Puts a creature in a room.
      Method parameters in pollaxmud.world with type arguments of type Creature 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void World.putCreaturesRandomly(java.util.List<? extends Creature> creatures, boolean onlyLockedRooms)
      Puts given creatures in randomly chosen Rooms in the world.
